app.lem: Das Ludwigslied
app.rdg: The Lay of Ludwig

app.lem: Einan kuning uueiz ih. Heizsit her hluduig.
app.rdg: I know a king, Ludwig is his name

app.lem: Ther gerno gode thionot. Ih uueiz her Imos lonot.
app.rdg: Who gladly serves god. I know it was worthwhile for him.

app.lem: Kind uuarth her faterlos. Thes uuarth Imo sar buoz
app.rdg: As a child he was fatherless. There was a replacement for him

app.lem: Holoda Inan truhtin. Magaczogo uuarth her sin.
app.rdg: The lord himself helped him and was his guardian.

app.lem: Gab her imo dugidi. Fronisc gi-thigini.
app.rdg: He gave Ludwig companions, a kingly entourage,

app.lem: Stuol hier In urankon. So bruche her es lango
app.rdg: The throne of the Franks, For a long time he rejoiced in these gifts!

app.lem: Thaz gi-deilder thanne. Sar mit karlemanne.
app.rdg: The Lordship was shared with Karlmann,

app.lem: Bruoder sinemo. Thia czala uuunniono.
app.rdg: his brother, the sum of the pleasures.

app.lem: So thaz uuarth al gendiot. Koron uuolda sin god.
app.rdg: After this was accomplished. God would test him [to see if]

l.app: Ob her arbeidi. So Iung tholon mahti. if he could endure hardship while so young </app

app.lem: Lietz her heidine man. Ober seo lidan.
app.rdg: He let heathens come over the sea,

app.lem: Thiot urancono. Manon sun-diono.
app.rdg: so the Franks would pay for their sins.

app.lem: Sume sar uer-lorane. Uuurdun sum erkorane .
app.rdg: Some would be lost immediately, others would be chosen for eternal salvation

app.lem: Haranskara tholota. Ther er misselebeta .
app.rdg: Severe punishments must be suffered by those who have lived in sin.

app.lem: Ther ther thanne thiob uuas. Ind er thanana ginas.
app.rdg: Those who had been thieves began to fast,

app.lem: Nam sina uaston. Sidh uuarth her guot man.
app.rdg: in this way they saved themselves and became good people.

app.lem: Sum uuas luginari. Sum skachari .
app.rdg: Another was a liar, another a robber

app.lem: Sum fol loses. Ind er gi-buozta sih thes.
app.rdg: a third lived without any control.

app.lem: Kuning uuas er-uirrit. Thaz richi al girrit.
Uuas er-bolgan krist. Leidhor thes Ingald iz.
app.rdg: The holy Christ was full of wrath. The kingdom must atone for this!

app.lem: Thoh er-barmedes got. Uuuisser alla thia not.
app.rdg: But God was also full of mercy.

Heigun sa north-man. Harto bi-duuungan.

app.lem: Dot ni rette mir iz. Al thaz . thu gibiudist.
Tho nam her godes urlub. Huob her gundfanon uf.
Reit her thara In urankon. Ingagan north-mannon.
Gode thancodun. The sin bei-dodun.
Quadhun al fro min. So lango bei-don uuir thin.
Thanne sprah luto. Hluduig ther guoto.
Trostet hiu gi-selleon. Mine not-stallon.
Hera santa mih god. Ioh mir selbo gibod
Ob hiu rat thuhti. Thaz ih hier ge-uuhti.
Mih selbon ni sparoti. Un-c ih hiu gi-neriti .
Nu uuill ih thaz mir uolgon. Alle godes holdon.

app.lem: Gi-skerit ist thiu hier-uuist. So lango so uuili krist.
Uuili her unsa hina-uarth. Thero habet her giuualt.
So uuer so hier In ellian. Gi-duot godes uuillion.
Quimit he gi-sund uz. Ih gi-lonon Imoz.
Bilibit her thar Inne. Sinemo kunnie.
Tho nam her skild Indi sper. Ellianlicho reit her.
Uuolder uuar er-rah-chon. Sina uuidar-sah-chon.
Tho ni uuas iz buro-lang. Fand her thia north-man
Gode lob sageda. Her sihit thes her gereda.
Ther kuning reit kuono. Sang lioth frano.
Ioh alle saman sungun. Kirrie-leison.
Sang uuas gi-sungan. Uuig uuas bi-gunnan.
Bluot skein In uuangon. Spilodun ther urankon.
Thar uaht thegeno gelih. Nichein soso hluduig.
Snel Indi kuoni. Thaz uuas Imo gekunni
Suman thuruh-skluog her. Suman thuruh-stah her.
Her skancta ce hanton. Sinan fianton
Bitteres lides. So uue hin hio thes libes.
Gilobot si thiu godes kraft. Hluduig uuarth sigihaft
[I]oh allen heiligon thanc. Sin uuarth ther sigi-kamf
[U]uolar abur hluduig. Kuning u[n]s[er] fralig.
[S]o garo so-s er hio uuas. So uuar so-s es thurft uuas.
Gi-halde inan thruhtin. Bi sinan ergrehtin.
